=======
History
=======

0.2.0 (2025-12-22)
------------------

* !6: Added support for EnFROSP v0.3.1 including all newly added (snow-screening related) parameters.


0.1.1 (2025-12-05)
------------------

* Added enfrosp to requirements.


0.1.0 (2025-12-03)
------------------

* Added initial version of EnFROSP GUI and revised pyproject.toml (!2).
* Package skeleton created with https://git.gfz.de/fernlab/products/cookiecutters/cookiecutter-python-package.


.. _!6: https://git.gfz.de/EnMAP/GFZ_Tools_EnMAP_BOX/enfrosp_enmapboxapp/-/merge_requests/6
